title: Meguiar's M0216 M2 Mirror Glaze Fine-Cut Cleaner - 16 Oz Bottle
features: DEFECT REMOVAL: Removes fine surface defects including light oxidation, stains, scratches, swirls and fresh water spots
PAINT CLEANER: Mildly abrasive cleaner cuts quickly, then reduces to a buffing rouge, leaving a professional finish ready for polishing and protecting
NO SCOURING: Buffered abrasive action lubricates the finish to prevent scouring or scratching
CLEAR COAT SAFE: Safe and effective on all glossy paint finishes including clear coats, and especially ideal for older lacquer and enamel paints
VERSATILE USE: Body shop safe formula can be used by hand, DA polisher or rotary buffer
description: Meguiarss Mirror Glaze M02 Fine-Cut Cleaner is a mildly abrasive cleaner that removes fine surface defects including light oxidation, stains, scratches, swirls and fresh water spots. Our special formula of buffered abrasives turns into a gentle buffing rouge, giving you a professional finish that’s ready for polishing and protecting. Buffered abrasive action lubricates the finish to prevent scouring. This professional cleaner also leaves a silicone-free surface essential for proper painting in a body shop environment. Safe and effective on all glossy paint finishes including clear coats, and ideal for older lacquer and enamel paints.
